org.magelan.core.db
Interface Row

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRow
public interface Row

Represents a row of the data source.

Version:
1.1, 09/2005
Author:
Assen Antov
See Also:
DataSource, DataSource.get(String, Object), DataSource.get(String, Object, String[])

Method Summary
 boolean delete()
          Deletes the row from the data source.
 java.lang.Object get(int field)
          Gets the data from the field at the parameter index.
 java.lang.Object[] getData()
          Returns the values of row's fields.
 DataSource getDataSource()
          Returns the DataSource the row belongs to
 boolean set(int field, java.lang.Object value)
          Sets the data for the field at the parameter index.
